H0.text: Which 5th/6th Century Buddhist monk is described in Chinese texts as ‘The Blue-Eyed Barbarian’. Bodhidharma's Disciple

H1.text: Which 5th/6th Century Buddhist monk is described in Chinese texts as ‘The Blue-Eyed Barbarian’. Gunabhadra

H2.text: Which 5th/6th Century Buddhist monk is described in Chinese texts as ‘The Blue-Eyed Barbarian’. Paramartha

H3.text: Which 5th/6th Century Buddhist monk is described in Chinese texts as ‘The Blue-Eyed Barbarian’. Tamo

A5.text: Guṇabhadra (Buddhist monk) is a Buddhist monk.
